Question:
Kai roto te kura i te āhua o te porotoru. Mēnā he rohe tapawhā 116 waewae tapawhā tō te pūtake tapatoru, ā, e 30 waewae te roa o te kura, e hia te nui o te wai e mau ana i te kura ina kī?
A.1725 ft^3
B.1740 ft^3
C.3480 ft^3
D.6960 ft^3
GivenAnswer:
hei tātai i te rahinga o te wai e mau ana i te kura, me mātua mōhio tātou ki te rahinga o te kura. kua kīia mai ko te āhua o te kura he porotoru, ā, ko te pūtake he tapatoru. ko te rohe o te pūtake tapatoru he 116 waewae tapawhā, ā, ko te roa o te kura he 30 waewae.

ko te rahinga o te porotoru ka taea te tātai mā te whakamahi i te tātaitanga:
\[ \text{volume} = \text{area of the base} \times \text{height} \]
\[ \text{volume} = 116 \text{ ft}^2 \times 30 \text{ ft} \]
\[ \text{volume} = 3480 \text{ ft}^3 \]

nō reira, ko te whakautu ko:
c. 3480 ft^3

Question:
Kimi $-\dfrac{1}{-3}\cdot\cfrac{1}{~\frac{1}{-3}~}.$
A.1
B.-1
C.0
D.2
GivenAnswer:
to solve the expression \( -\dfrac{1}{-3} \cdot \cfrac{1}{\frac{1}{-3}} \), we first simplify each part.

1. simplify \( -\dfrac{1}{-3} \):
   \[
   -\dfrac{1}{-3} = \dfrac{1}{3}
   \]

2. simplify \( \cfrac{1}{\frac{1}{-3}} \):
   \[
   \cfrac{1}{\frac{1}{-3}} = -3
   \]

now, multiply the results:
\[
\dfrac{1}{3} \cdot (-3) = -1
\]

thus, the value of the expression is \(\boxed{-1}\).

Question:

B.Ko te ōwehenga o tōna kōkuhutanga ki tēnei wā.

i roto i te horopaki o te hiko, ko te "ngaohiko" (voltage) e tāutuhia ana hei hua o te ātete (resistance) me te rere o te iahiko (current). ko te ture e whakamārama ana i tēnei hononga ko te ture a ohm, e whakapuaki ana i te pānga i waenga i te ngaohiko (v), te ātete (r), me te iahiko (i). ko te tātai mō tēnei ture ko v = ir, arā, ko te ngaohiko te hua o te ātete me te iahiko. nō reira, mēnā ka hurihia tēnei tātai hei rapu i te ātete, ka taea te tuhi ko r = v/i, arā, ko te ātete ko te ōwehenga o te ngaohiko ki te iahiko.

Question:

Question:
He aha a Parfit e whakahē ana i te ōritetanga?
A.E tautohe ana a ia i te iwi taurite e kore e mōhiotia.
B.E kī ana a ia mā te hoatu manakē ki nga hiahia o te rawakore, ka taea e tātau te whakanui ake i te ōritetanga.
C.E kī ana a ia ko tātau ia kawenga mo to tātau rawakore.
D.Ka whakakāhore katoa a ia i te ariā o te ōritetanga.
GivenAnswer:
ko te whakahē a derek parfit i te ōritetanga e hāngai ana ki tāna tautohetohe mō te "leveling down objection." e ai ki tēnei tautohetohe, kāore i te tika te ōritetanga mēnā ka tutuki mā te whakaiti i te pai o ētahi tāngata kia rite ai ki te hunga e iti ake ana ō rātou pai, kāore hoki e piki ake te pai o te hunga rawakore. hei tauira, mēnā ka whakaitihia te taumata oranga o te hunga whai rawa kia ōrite ki te hunga rawakore, engari kāore e whakapai ake i te oranga o te hunga rawakore, kāore tēnei i te whakapiki i te pai o te katoa, ā, kāore e tika ana hei whāinga mō te ōritetanga pono. nā reira, ko te whakautu tika ki tēnei pātai, ahakoa kāore i tino mārama te whakatakoto, ko:

b. e kī ana a ia mā te hoatu manakē ki nga hiahia o te rawakore, ka taea e tātau te whakanui ake i te ōritetanga.

ahakoa kāore tēnei kōwhiringa i te tino whakaatu i te tino tirohanga a parfit, e whakaatu ana i te hiahia ki te aro ki te pai o te hunga rawakore hei huarahi ki te whakapai ake i te ōritetanga, kaua ki te whakaiti i te pai o ētahi atu.

Question:
I tuhia e tētahi kaiwhakahaere te papatono ki raro nei. Ka whakamahi te papatono i tētahi rārangi tau e kiia nei ko numList. Ko te tikanga kia whakaaturia e te papatono te tapeke o ngā tau i te rārangi.
 tapeke ← numList [1]
 MŌ IA uara i roto i te numList
 tapeke ← tapeke + uara
 Tapeke WHAKAATU
 Hei whakamātau i te papatono, ka arawhiti te kaihōtaka i te numList ki [0 , 1 , 4 , 5]. Ka whakaatu te papatono i te 10, ā, ka whakamutua e te kaiwhakahaere e mahi ana te papatono. Ko tēhea o ēnei e whai ake nei e pono ana?
A.He tika te whakamutunga; ka mahi te papatono e tika ana.
B.Kei te hē te whakamutunga; kāore te papatono e whakaatu i te uara tika mō te pū whakamātautau [0, 1, 4, 5].
C.Kei te hē te whakamutunga; mā te whakamahi i te pū whakamātautau [0, 1, 4, 5] kāore i te tika hei whakamutu i te papatono e tika ana.
D.Kei te hē te whakamutunga; mā te whakamahi i te pū whakamātautau [0, 1, 4, 5] anake e whakaū ana kei te mahi te papatono mō ngā rārangi i te nui haere o te raupapa.
GivenAnswer:
b. kei te hē te whakamutunga; kāore te papatono e whakaatu i te uara tika mō te pū whakamātautau [0, 1, 4, 5].

hei whakamārama:
i te papatono, ka tīmata te tatau o te tapeke mā te tango i te uara tuatahi o te rārangi numlist, arā, numlist[1]. i te rārangi numlist [0, 1, 4, 5], ko numlist[1] = 1. nā reira, ka tīmata te tapeke ki te uara 1. 

ka tāpiri te papatono i ia uara o te rārangi ki te tapeke, tae atu ki te uara tuatahi. nā reira, ka tātaihia te tapeke pēnei:
- tapeke = 1 (tīmatanga)
- tapeke = 1 + 0 = 1
- tapeke = 1 + 1 = 2
- tapeke = 2 + 4 = 6
- tapeke = 6 + 5 = 11

nā reira, ko te tapeke tika mō te rārangi [0, 1, 4, 5] ko 11, kaua ko 10. kei te hē te whakamutunga i te mea e kī ana te papatono ka whakaatu i te 10, engari ko te uara tika kia whakaatuhia ko 11.

Question:
Na te rangahau a Garcia rāua ko Koelling e pā ana ki ngā tahuringa i akona, ko tēhea o ngā takirua UCS me te CS e whai ake nei te tino kaha, ā, i tere rawa te ako?
A.mahi i tētahi mahi me te whiwhi utu kai
B.kai, kai, inu rānei
C.nekehanga me te tumeke
D.whiunga me nga utu
GivenAnswer:
i roto i ngā rangahau a garcia rāua ko koelling, i kitea e rāua he hononga kaha i waenga i te whakamahi i te kai (ucs) me te reka o te kai (cs) i roto i ngā tikanga ako tahuringa. ko tēnei hononga i kitea he tino kaha, ā, i tere rawa te ako. nā reira, ko te whiringa b "kai, kai, inu rānei" te tino kaha, ā, i tere rawa te ako i roto i ngā rangahau a garcia rāua ko koelling.

i roto i ā rāua rangahau, i kitea e garcia rāua ko koelling e kore e taea e ngā kiore te ako ki te hono i te reka o te kai ki te whiunga pērā i te tumeke hiko, engari ka taea e rātou te hono tere me te kaha ki te reka o te kai me te māuiui puku i muri i te kai. ko tēnei kitenga e whakaatu ana i te hiranga o te 'biological preparedness' - arā, ko ētahi hononga i waenga i te ucs me te cs he māmā ake te ako nā te mea kua rite te rauropi ki te ako i aua momo hononga mō te oranga.

Question:
Ko ngā Mutations e pā ana ki te pānga ka taea te whakawātea hei:
A.He tōraro kaha.
B.whai rawa.
C.Ko te āhua o te āhua o te āhua o
D.ngaronga-o-te-mahi.
GivenAnswer:
ko ngā mutations, arā, ngā huringa i roto i te dna, ka taea te whai pānga rerekē ki te mahi a te ira. ka taea e ēnei mutations te whakarōpūtia hei:

a. he tōraro kaha (gain-of-function): ko tēnei momo mutation ka piki te mahi a te ira, ka puta rānei he mahi hou i te pūmua e hangaia ana.

b. whai rawa (neutral): ko ēnei mutations kāore e pā ki te mahi a te ira, ā, kāore he pānga kitea ki te oranga o te rauropi.

c. ko te āhua o te āhua o te āhua o (change-of-function): ka huri tēnei momo mutation i te mahi taketake a te ira, ā, ka puta he mahi rerekē i te pūmua e hangaia ana.

d. ngaronga-o-te-mahi (loss-of-function): ka heke, ka ngaro rānei te mahi a te ira nā tēnei momo mutation, ka mutu, ka kore e taea e te pūmua te mahi i tōna mahi taketake.

ko ēnei momo mutations ka taea te whai pānga nui ki te hauora me te oranga o te rauropi, ā, ka taea te whakamahi hei whāinga mā te rangahau pūtaiao me te rongoā.

Question:
Tērā pea ka tukuna atu he tāke i whakaritea ki tētahi kaiwhakarato ki te kaihoko i te āhua o te utu mēnā ka nui ake te utu
A.He tino tāwari te utu o te tono.
B.He tino tāwari te utu o te tono.
C.Ko te tāwari utu o te tono he tāwariwari wae.
D.He tino tāwari te āhua o te tono.
GivenAnswer: i te āhua o tēnei pātai, me mārama ki te horopaki o te kōrero. ko te kōrero e pā ana ki te tāke i whakaritea, ā, ka tukuna pea ki te kaihoko mēnā ka nui ake te utu o te tono. ko te whiringa e tika ana i konei, me mātua whai whakaaro ki te āhua o te utu me te tāwari o te tono. ahakoa he ōrite ngā whiringa a, b, me d i te mea e kī ana katoa "he tino tāwari te utu o te tono" rānei "he tino tāwari te āhua o te tono," ko te whiringa c, "ko te tāwari utu o te tono he tāwariwari wae," e whakaatu ana i tētahi āhuatanga rerekē, arā, he tāwariwari wae te tāwari utu. heoi, i te mea kāore i te mārama te tikanga o "tāwariwari wae" i tēnei horopaki, ka kōwhiria te whiringa e tino ōrite ana ki te horopaki o te pātai. i tēnei take, ka kōwhiri au i te whiringa a, b rānei, nā te mea e kōrero ana mō te tāwari o te utu o te tono, e hāngai ana ki te kaupapa o te tāke i whakaritea e ai ki te utu.

Question:
Ko te tōtika quantum o tētahi pūoko whakaahua ko te 0.1. Mēnā e 100 ngā whakaahua ka tukuna ki roto i te pūoko, kotahi i muri i tētahi, ka kitea e te pūoko ngā whakaahua
A.e 10 ngā wā, me te whakataka 4
B.e 10 ngā wā, me te whakataka rms tata ki te 3
C.e 10 ngā wā, me te whakataka 1
D.e 10 ngā wā, me te whakataka 0.1
GivenAnswer:
ko te tōtika quantum (quantum efficiency) o tētahi pūoko whakaahua e tohu ana i te ōrau o ngā pūtau marama (photons) ka hurihia hei hiko, arā, hei tohu mō te maha o ngā whakaahua ka kitea e te pūoko. mēnā ko te tōtika quantum he 0.1, arā, 10% o ngā pūtau marama ka hurihia hei hiko.

mēnā ka tukuna 100 ngā whakaahua ki roto i te pūoko, ka taea e tātou te tūmanako ka kitea e te pūoko tata ki te 10% o ēnei, arā, tata ki te 10 ngā whakaahua. heoi, nā te mea he tukanga tupurangi te hopu i ngā pūtau marama, ka puta he rerekētanga i te maha o ngā whakaahua ka kitea i ia wā.

ka taea te whakamahi i te ture binomial hei tātai i te tohatoha o ngā hua ka puta. ko te tātaitanga o te hapa paerewa (standard deviation) mō tētahi tukanga binomial he √(np(1-p)), kei hea n te tapeke o ngā nganatanga (i tēnei take, 100) me p te pūtake angitu mō ia nganatanga (i tēnei take, 0.1).

√(100 x 0.1 x (1 - 0.1)) = √(100 x 0.1 x 0.9) = √9 = 3

nō reira, ko te hapa paerewa (standard deviation) mō te maha o ngā whakaahua ka kitea he 3. ko tēnei te tikanga ka taea e te pūoko te kite i te 10 ngā whakaahua, ā, ko te hapa paerewa he 3. ko tēnei ka whakaatu i te rerekētanga o ngā hua ka puta i ngā wā rerekē.

nā reira, ko te whakautu tika ko:
b. e 10 ngā wā, me te whakataka rms tata ki te 3

Question:
Whakaritea te ārohi H+(aq) i roto i te 1.0 M phenol, C6H5OH, rongoā. (Ko te Ka for phenol ko te 1 × 10^-10.)
A.1 × 10^-10 M
B.1 × 10^-9 M
C.1 × 10^-3 M
D.1 × 10^-5 M
GivenAnswer:
hei whakarite i te ārohi o h⁺ (aq) i roto i te rongoā o te phenol, me mātua mārama ki te tātaitanga o te ph mā te whakamahi i te tātaitanga o te taurite waikawa. ko te phenol, c6h5oh, he waikawa ngoikore me te pākawa waikawa (ka) e 1 × 10^-10.

ko te tātaitanga:
\[ \text{c6h5oh} \rightleftharpoons \text{c6h5o}^- + \text{h}^+ \]

ka taea te whakamahi i te tātaitanga o te taurite waikawa:
\[ k_a = \frac{[\text{c6h5o}^-][\text{h}^+]}{[\text{c6h5oh}]} \]

i te mea ko te kukū o te phenol i te tīmatanga he 1.0 m, ka taea te whakaaro ko te kukū o te c6h5oh ka noho tonu tata ki te 1.0 m nā te mea he ngoikore te waikawa. mēnā ka whakaae tātou ko te kukū o te h⁺ me te c6h5o⁻ he x m i te taurite, ka taea te tuhi i te tātaitanga pēnei:

\[ 1 \times 10^{-10} = \frac{x \times x}{1.0} \]
\[ 1 \times 10^{-10} = x^2 \]
\[ x = \sqrt{1 \times 10^{-10}} \]
\[ x = 1 \times 10^{-5} \]

nō reira, ko te ārohi o h⁺ i roto i te rongoā 1.0 m o te phenol he 1 × 10^-5 m. ko te whakautu tika ko:
d. 1 × 10^-5 m

Question:
E whakaaturia ana e tēhea o ēnei e whai ake nei tētahi o ēnei e whai ake nei?
A.He tauira cyclical i roto i nga residuals
B.He tauira whakarerekē i roto i nga residuals
C.He matapōkere katoa i roto i nga residuals
D.Ngā Residuals e tata ana ki te kore
GivenAnswer:
kia ora! heoi anō, kāore i tino mārama te pātai i tukuna mai. heoi, ka taea e au te whakamārama i ngā kōwhiringa e whā e pā ana ki ngā residuals i roto i te tātaritanga raraunga:

a. he tauira cyclical i roto i nga residuals - mēnā kei te kitea he tauira cyclical i roto i ngā residuals, arā, he auau te huringa o ngā uara residual i runga i te wā, tērā pea e tohu ana kua ngaro tētahi wāhanga nui o te tauira i roto i te tauira matua, pērā i te wāhanga wa, te wāhanga huringa rānei.

b. he tauira whakarerekē i roto i nga residuals - mēnā kei te kitea he tauira whakarerekē i roto i ngā residuals, arā, kei te huri te tohatoha o ngā residuals i runga i te wā, tērā pea e tohu ana kua kore e ōrite te hapa (variance) o ngā residuals, ā, me whakaaro pea ki te whakamahi i ngā tikanga pērā i te whakarerekētanga o te hapa.

c. he matapōkere katoa i roto i nga residuals - ko tēnei te āhua pai mō ngā residuals i muri i te tauira pai. mēnā he matapōkere katoa ngā residuals, arā, kāore he tauira kitea, he tohu tēnei kua pai te tauira i te raraunga, ā, kua tangohia ngā āhuatanga katoa e tika ana.

d. ngā residuals e tata ana ki te kore - mēnā e tata ana ngā residuals ki te kore, arā, he iti rawa ngā rerekētanga i waenganui i ngā uara tūturu me ngā uara i matapaetia e te tauira, he tohu tēnei kua tino pai te tauira ki te whakamārama i te raraunga.

mēnā he pātai anō tāu, tēnā koa, whakamārama mai anō.

Question:
Ko te mea ka nekehia te auautanga pōkākā o te pūmāota (DCl) mai i tērā o te hauwai hauwai (HCl) nā ngā rerekētanga o tō rātou
A.tuari irahiko
B.wā tou
C.tōpana taimau
D.iti iho te maha
GivenAnswer:
ko te rerekētanga o te auautanga pōkākā i waenga i te pūmāota deuterium chloride (dcl) me te hydrogen chloride (hcl) ka hua mai i te rerekētanga o tō rāua **c. tōpana taimau**.

hei whakamārama, ko te tōpana taimau (molecular mass) o te dcl he nui ake i tō te hcl nā te mea ko te deuterium (d) he taumaha ake i te hauwai (h). ko te deuterium he isotopu o te hauwai e rua ngā karihi i tōna karihi (neutron kotahi me te proton kotahi), ā, ko te hauwai māori (protium) he proton kotahi anake, kāore he neutron. nā tēnei rerekētanga i te tōpana, ka pā he rerekētanga ki te auautanga pōkākā o te pūmāota.

i roto i te tātai mō te auautanga pōkākā, ka whakamahia te ture a hooke mō te puna hiko:
\[ \nu = \frac{1}{2\pi} \sqrt{\frac{k}{\mu}} \]
i reira \( \nu \) te auautanga, \( k \) te pakeke o te puna (e pā ana ki te kaha hononga hiko), ā, \( \mu \) te pūtoro whakarea (reduced mass) o te pūnaha e rua ngā matūriki. ko te pūtoro whakarea ka tātaihia mā te whakamahi i ngā tōpana o ngā ngota e rua:
\[ \mu = \frac{m_1 m_2}{m_1 + m_2} \]
i reira \( m_1 \) me \( m_2 \) ngā tōpana o ngā ngota.

nā te mea he taumaha ake te deuterium i te hauwai, he nui ake te pūtoro whakarea o te dcl i tō te hcl, ā, ka iti ake te auautanga pōkākā o te dcl i tō te hcl.

Question:
Tauākī 1 | I roto i tētahi rōpū (ab)^{-2} = b^{-2}a^{-2}. Tauākī 2 | I roto i tētahi rōpū (ab)^n = a^nb^n.
A.Pono, Pono
B.Teka, teka
C.Pono, False
D.Pono
GivenAnswer:
hei whakautu i tēnei pātai, me mātua mārama ki ngā ture o te tātai rōpū (group theory) me te whakahaere i ngā hurihanga me ngā hurihanga whakamuri (inverses) me ngā mana (powers) i roto i tētahi rōpū.

**tauākī 1: (ab)^{-2} = b^{-2}a^{-2}**

i roto i tētahi rōpū, ko te tikanga o te hurihanga whakamuri o tētahi hua, pēnei i (ab), ka hurihia te raupapa o ngā huānga ka whakamurihia ia takitahi. nō reira, (ab)^{-1} = b^{-1}a^{-1}. mā te whakamahi i tēnei ture:

(ab)^{-2} = (ab)^{-1}(ab)^{-1} = (b^{-1}a^{-1})(b^{-1}a^{-1}) = b^{-1}(a^{-1}b^{-1})a^{-1}.

ki te kore e kīia he rōpū abelian (arā, he rōpū ka pērā a·b = b·a mō ngā a, b katoa o te rōpū), kāore e taea te kī tika ko a^{-1}b^{-1} = b^{-1}a^{-1}. nō reira, kāore e taea te whakapūmau ko (ab)^{-2} = b^{-2}a^{-2} mō ngā rōpū katoa. heoi, mēnā he rōpū abelian te rōpū, ka pono tēnei tauākī.

**tauākī 2: (ab)^n = a^nb^n**

ko tēnei tauākī, pērā i te tauākī tuatahi, ka pono anake mēnā he rōpū abelian te rōpū. i roto i tētahi rōpū abelian, ka taea te whakawhiti i ngā huānga me te kore e pā te hua. heoi, i roto i tētahi rōpū kāore i te abelian, kāore e taea te kī pēnei, nā te mea ka rerekē te hua i runga i te raupapa o ngā huānga.

**whakautu:**

nā te mea kāore i te mārama mēnā he rōpū abelian te rōpū e kōrerohia ana, ka taea anake te kī pono ēnei tauākī mēnā he rōpū abelian. mēnā kāore i te abelian, he hē ēnei tauākī. nō reira, ko te whakautu tika, i runga i te mōhiohio i hoatu, ko:

b. teka, teka

Question:
I roto i te xy-plane, ko te kauwhata o x^(log y) = y^log x ko
A.te tapawhā tuatahi e tuwhera ana
B.he ānau kati
C.he hihi i te tapawhā tuatahi e tuwhera ana
D.he ira kotahi
GivenAnswer:
hei whakaoti i tēnei pātai, me mātua mārama tātou ki te āhua o te kauwhata o te whārite \(x^{\log y} = y^{\log x}\) i te xy-plane.

tuatahi, kia mātua mārama tātou ki te whārite:
\[ x^{\log y} = y^{\log x} \]

ka taea te whakarerekē i tēnei whārite mā te whakamahi i ngā ture o ngā logarithms me ngā exponents. mā te tango i te logarithm o ia taha, ka taea te tuhi:
\[ \log y \cdot \log x = \log x \cdot \log y \]

ko tēnei whārite he pono mō ngā uara katoa o \(x\) me \(y\) e kore e taea te tango i te logarithm o te kore, arā, mō ngā \(x > 0\) me \(y > 0\). heoi, he mea nui kia mārama tātou ki te āhua o te kauwhata.

ko tētahi atu huarahi ki te whakaaro mō tēnei whārite ko te whakamahi i te ture o te huringa o ngā exponents:
\[ x^{\log y} = (e^{\log x})^{\log y} = e^{(\log x)(\log y)} \]
\[ y^{\log x} = (e^{\log y})^{\log x} = e^{(\log y)(\log x)} \]

nā te mea ko \( (\log x)(\log y) = (\log y)(\log x) \), ka kitea he pono tēnei whārite mō ngā uara katoa o \(x\) me \(y\) i roto i te rohe tika.

i te mea ka taea e tēnei whārite te whakamārama mā te whakamahi i te ture o te huringa o ngā exponents, ka kitea ko te kauwhata o tēnei whārite ka whakakapi i te tapawhā tuatahi katoa (te wāhi e pai ana ngā uara o \(x\) me \(y\) mō te tango i te logarithm).

nā reira, ko te whakautu tika ko:
a. te tapawhā tuatahi e tuwhera ana

Question:
Kai roto te āhua o te whakahaerenga i te hōhātanga hōhonu. Nā tēnei āhuatanga ohaoha e tika ana ngā tauākī e whai ake nei mō te kaupapahere moni?
A.Ma te kaupapa here tūmanako anake e whakararuraru te hōnore.
B.Ka tino whakanui ake te kaupapahere tūmanako i te tono rōpū mēnā he tairongo te pūtea penapena ki ngā huringa o te mokatere huamoni.
C.Ko te kaupapahere kirimana te whakanui tika mo te pūtea penapena me te whakapaunga.
D.Mēnā he tino pai te hiahia moni mo te moni, tērā pea ka tino pai te kaupapahere moni whakanui.
GivenAnswer:
i te tātari i ngā tauākī e pā ana ki te kaupapahere moni me te whakahaere i te hōhātanga hōhonu, me mārama ki ngā ariā matua e pā ana ki te kaupapahere moni, te tono rōpū, me te pūtea penapena. anei taku whakamārama mō ia tauākī:

a. mā te kaupapa here tūmanako anake e whakararuraru te hōnore.
   - he uaua te whakatau mēnā he tika tēnei tauākī, nā te mea kāore i te mārama te tikanga o "hōnore" i tēnei horopaki. mēnā e kōrero ana mō te "hōhātanga hōhonu" (deep stagnation), te tikanga o tēnei tauākī kāore i te tino mārama.

b. ka tino whakanui ake te kaupapahere tūmanako i te tono rōpū mēnā he tairongo te pūtea penapena ki ngā huringa o te mokatere huamoni.
   - he tika tēnei tauākī. mēnā he tairongo te pūtea penapena ki ngā huringa o te mokatere huamoni, ka taea e te kaupapahere tūmanako (expansionary policy) te whakapiki i te tono rōpū mā te whakaheke i ngā reiti huamoni, ā, ka whakatenatena i te whakapaunga me te haumi.

c. ko te kaupapahere kirimana te whakanui tika mo te pūtea penapena me te whakapaunga.
   - ehara tēnei i te tauākī tika. ko te kaupapahere kirimana (contractionary policy), pērā i te pikinga o ngā reiti huamoni, ka ārai i te whakapaunga me te haumi nā te mea ka piki te utu o te nama, ā, ka nui ake te pūtea penapena nā te mea ka pai ake ngā hua o ngā pūtea penapena.

d. mēnā he tino pai te hiahia moni mo te moni, tērā pea ka tino pai te kaupapahere moni whakanui.
   - he tika tēnei tauākī. mēnā he nui te hiahia mō te moni (high liquidity preference), ka iti ake te pānga o te kaupapahere moni whakanui, nā te mea ka kaha ake te iwi ki te pupuri i te moni hei pūtea penapena, kaua ki te whakapaunga.

i runga i ēnei whakamārama, ko te tauākī b te tino tika mō te whakahaere i te hōhātanga hōhonu mā te kaupapahere moni.

Question:
Kimihia te roanga o te ānau y = ln x i waenga i ngā pūwāhi i reira te y = 1/2 me te y = 1.
A.0.53
B.0.86
C.1.18
D.1.36
GivenAnswer:
hei kimi i te roanga o te ānau o te rārangi \( y = \ln x \) i waenga i ngā pūwāhi e rua, arā, i waenga i ngā uara \( y = \frac{1}{2} \) me \( y = 1 \), me whakamahi tātou i te tātaitanga o te roanga o te ānau mā te whakamahi i te tātaitanga tātai.

tuatahi, kimi ai i ngā uara o \( x \) mō ia uara o \( y \):
1. \( y = \frac{1}{2} \) ka hua:
   \[
   \ln x = \frac{1}{2} \implies x = e^{\frac{1}{2}} = \sqrt{e}
   \]
2. \( y = 1 \) ka hua:
   \[
   \ln x = 1 \implies x = e
   \]

ināianei, ka tātaihia te roanga o te ānau mai i \( x = \sqrt{e} \) ki \( x = e \) mā te whakamahi i te tātaitanga tātai:
\[
\text{roanga} = \int_{\sqrt{e}}^{e} \sqrt{1 + \left(\frac{dy}{dx}\right)^2} \, dx
\]
i te mea \( y = \ln x \), ka hua \( \frac{dy}{dx} = \frac{1}{x} \). nā reira:
\[
\text{roanga} = \int_{\sqrt{e}}^{e} \sqrt{1 + \left(\frac{1}{x}\right)^2} \, dx
\]
\[
= \int_{\sqrt{e}}^{e} \sqrt{1 + \frac{1}{x^2}} \, dx
\]

ka taea te whakamahi i te tātaitanga tātai ki te whakaoti i tēnei tātaitanga:
\[
\text{roanga} = \int_{\sqrt{e}}^{e} \sqrt{\frac{x^2 + 1}{x^2}} \, dx = \int_{\sqrt{e}}^{e} \frac{\sqrt{x^2 + 1}}{x} \, dx
\]

ko tēnei tātaitanga he uaua ake te whakaoti mā te ringa, engari ka taea te whakamahi i te rorohiko pērā i te wolfram alpha, te matlab rānei, te python rānei ki te tātai i te uara. ko te whakautu tika, i runga i ngā kōwhiringa kua hoatu, ko:

b. 0.86

heoi, me mātua whakamahi he taputapu tātaitanga hei tātai tika i tēnei uara.

Question:
Ko tēhea o ngā huinga moka e whai ake nei ka TAEA te whakaahua ki tētahi kīanga auau?
A.Ko ngā aho moka katoa, ko tōna maha o ngā kore he maha o ngā kore e rima
B.Ngā aho moka katoa e tīmata ana ki te kore me te whakamutu ki tētahi
C.Ngā aho moka katoa me te maha o ngā kore
D.Ngā aho moka katoa me ētahi atu mea i te kore
GivenAnswer:
hei whakautu i tēnei pātai, me mārama tuatahi ki te ariā o te kīanga auau (regular expression) me pēhea te whakamahi i tēnei momo kīanga hei whakaahua i ngā huinga o ngā aho moka (binary strings).

ko te kīanga auau he ara hei whakaahua i ngā huinga o ngā aho mā te whakamahi i ngā tohu motuhake pērā i te whakakotahitanga (concatenation), te kōwhiringa (alternation), me te tukurua (repetition). ka taea e ngā kīanga auau te whakaahua i ngā momo tauira auau i roto i ngā aho.

a. ko ngā aho moka katoa, ko tōna maha o ngā kore he maha o ngā kore e rima.
   - hei tauira, ko ngā aho pēnei i "00000", "10000", "01000", etc., kei roto i tēnei huinga.
   - ka taea te whakaahua tēnei huinga mā te kīanga auau pēnei i "(0|1)*00000(0|1)*", e tohu ana i te aho e whai ana i te rima kore i roto i tētahi wāhi o te aho.

b. ngā aho moka katoa e tīmata ana ki te kore me te whakamutu ki tētahi.
   - hei tauira, ko ngā aho pēnei i "01", "001", "0101", etc., kei roto i tēnei huinga.
   - ka taea te whakaahua tēnei huinga mā te kīanga auau "0(0|1)*1", e tohu ana i te aho e tīmata ana ki te kore, ka mutu ki te tahi.

c. ngā aho moka katoa me te maha o ngā kore.
   - hei tauira, ko ngā aho pēnei i "0", "00", "000", etc., kei roto i tēnei huinga.
   - ka taea te whakaahua tēnei huinga mā te kīanga auau "0+", e tohu ana i te aho e kei roto i te kotahi neke atu rānei ngā kore.

d. ngā aho moka katoa me ētahi atu mea i te kore.

Question:

Question:

Question:

Question:
Kātahi anō ka whakatuwhera anō te hokomaha i muri i te katinga o te rua wiki mo nga whakatikatikatanga. I te ata o te whakatuwhera anō, ka hokohoko tētahi wahine i tana takanga ohorere, a, ka pā ki te waewae pakaru. I muri iho, ka whiua e te wahine te hokomaha mo nga mate whaiaro. I roto i tōna hūtu, ka kī te wahine kua haere a ia ki runga i tētahi pākete peita e takoto ana i roto i tētahi o nga ara. I te whakawātanga, ka karangatia e te wahine tētahi atu kiritaki hai whakaatu, i a ia e hokohoko ana, ka rongo a ia i te thud, ka huri, ka kite i te wahine e taka ana i runga i te papa. I whakaaturia hoki e ia i kite a ia i tētahi pākete peita wātea e takoto ana i ētahi waewae ruarua i te waewae o te wahine. I runga i te whakamātautau whakawhiti, ka uru te kiritaki ki tētahi whakawhitinga tautohe ki te rōia o te hokomaha. No te pātaitanga ki tōna whakaaro he aha te take o te hinganga o te wahine, ka whakaaturia e te kiritaki, "I hinga a ia nā te mea i haere a ia ki runga i te pākete. " Heoi anō, i whakaae a ia ki te whakamātautau whakawhiti, kaore tonu a ia i kite i te haerenga o te wahine i runga i te pākete. Kātahi ka pātai atu te rōia o te hokomaha ki te kiritaki i te pātai e whai ake nei:"Ki te kore koe e kite i te wahine e haere ana i runga i te pākete, me pēhea koe e mōhio ai kua hinga a ia nā reira?" Ka whakautua e te kiritaki, "Nā te mea i kōrero mai taku kōtiro e hokohoko tahi ana me au ā muri ake ka kite a ia i te wahine e haere ana i runga i te pākete. " Ka neke te rōia o te hokomaha ki te tuki i te whakautu whakamutunga a te kiritaki. Ki te whakakorea e te kaiwhakawā whakawā te mōtini a te tangata whakapae, ā, ka whakaaetia te whakautu a te kiritaki kia tū, tērā pea nā te mea
A.I pōhiritia te whakautu a te kiritaki e te pātai a te rōia o te hokomaha.
B.I takea te whakautu a te kiritaki i runga i te mātauranga tuatahi.
C.Ko te whakautu a te kiritaki he kōrero mo te whakaaro o mua tata nei.
D.He ariā mōhio te whakautu a te kiritaki i tēnei wā.
GivenAnswer:
a.i pōhiritia te whakautu a te kiritaki e te pātai a te rōia o te hokomaha.

i tēnei horopaki, ko te pātai a te rōia o te hokomaha i arahi i te kiritaki ki te whakamārama i tōna mōhio ki te take i hinga ai te wahine. nā te mea i pātai te rōia mēnā kāore te kiritaki i kite i te wahine e haere ana i runga i te pākete, me pēhea ia e mōhio ai kua hinga a ia nā reira, ka whakautua e te kiritaki mā te kōrero mō tāna i rongo ai i tāna kōtiro. nā te pātai a te rōia i whakatuwhera te huarahi mō te kiritaki ki te whakamārama i tōna mōhio mā te kōrero a tētahi atu, ā, nā reira i pōhiritia ai tēnei whakautu e te pātai a te rōia.

Question:
I whiwhi nga pirihimana i tētahi aki mai i tētahi kaitiaki pono kai te mahi te tangata i te rongoā i tōna kāinga. Kātahi ka tukuna atu e nga āpiha ki te kaiwhakawā he oati tautohe e whakaatu ana i te take tūpono mo te whakaputa i tētahi whakamana rapu. Ka tukuna e te kaiwhakawā he whakamana rapu mo nga rongoā rongoā i te wāhitau o te tangata. Ka haere nga āpiha pirihimana ki te kāinga o taua tangata, a, ka tangi i te pere tatau. No te korenga o tētahi tangata e whakautu, ka pakaru nga pirihimana, a, ka tomo ki te nohoanga. I rapua e rātau nga rūma i runga i te papa tuatahi, a, kaore i kitea he whakaaturanga whakararuraru, kātahi ka haere ki waho, a, ka kite i tētahi tomokanga motuhake e ahu ana ki te papa tuarua o te nohoanga. Ka piki atu rātau ki te huarahi, a, ka tomo ki roto i te rūma moe. I roto i te rūma ka kitea e nga āpiha he rehu o te hīkaka e takoto ana i runga i te kākahu. I a rātau e haere tonu ana nga āpiha ki te rapu i te rūma moe, ka tomo te tangata whakapae ki te rūma. Ka pātai atu nga pirihimana ki te tangata whakapae mehemea ko ia te tangata. Ka kitea e te tangata whakapae a ia, a, ka kī atu ki nga pirihimana kai roto rātau i tōna rūma moe, a, ka nohoia e ia te papa tuarua o te nohoanga. Ka whakamātauria e te tangata whakapae e noho ana te tangata i runga i te papa tuatahi, a, i wehea ōna wāhi ora i te hunga whakapae. Ahakoa rā, i whakatakotoria te tangata whakapae ki raro i te hopu, a, ka whakahaua ki te pupuri i te rongoā. Kua whakaputaina e te tangata whakapae he mōtini hai aukati i te hīkaka kia kore ai e whakaaetia ki te whakaaturanga. Ko te tikanga ko te mōtini a te tangata whakapae ko
A.I tukuna, no te mea kaore te whakamana i whakaingoa i te hunga whakapae.
B.I tukuna, nā te mea kāore te whakamana i āhua i runga i te tauwhāititanga o te rohe kia rapua.
C.Ka whakakāhore, no te mea i whakapono tika nga pirihimana e rapu ana rātau i te whare o taua tangata i to rātau tomo ki nga wāhi ora o te tangata whakapae.
D.I whakakāhore, nā te mea he tika te whakamana, a, ka tukuna atu he take tūpono.
GivenAnswer:
c. ka whakakāhore, no te mea i whakapono tika nga pirihimana e rapu ana rātau i te whare o taua tangata i to rātau tomo ki nga wāhi ora o te tangata whakapae.

i tēnei āhuatanga, ahakoa te kī a te tangata whakapae kāore ia i te noho tahi me te tangata i te papa tuatahi, me te kī hoki kāore ōna wāhi ora i te hunga whakapae, i whakapono tika ngā pirihimana kei te rapu rātau i te wāhi tika i raro i te mana o te whakamana rapu. ko te whakamana rapu i tukuna e te kaiwhakawā i whakaae kia rapua te wāhitau, ā, i te korenga o tētahi tohu mārama i te wā o te rapunga e tohu ana kāore te tangata whakapae e noho ana ki reira, ka taea e ngā pirihimana te whakapono he tika tā rātau mahi.

Question:
Kei tēnei mana whakahaere te tikanga hara e whai ake nei:"Ehara te tangata i te kawenga mo te whanonga hara mehemea i te wā o taua whanonga, nā te mate hinengaro, te hēnga rānei, kāore i a ia te kaha nui ki te whakamōhio atu ki te hē o tana whanonga, ki te whakarite rānei i tana whanonga ki ngā whakaritenga o te ture. " I tētahi ahiahi, he pēpi te tangata whakapae i tana irāmutu e rima tau. I a rātau e tākaro ana i te hopu i waho, ka whiua e te tangata whakapae te pōro ki runga i te māhunga o tana irāmutu, a, ka huri ki te tiriti. I runga anō i te pōro, ka oma te irāmutu i muri i te pōro, engari i haere ki runga i te kōrere, a, ka hinga i te tiriti. No tana haerenga, ka tino rere te irāmutu i tōna raparapa, a, kaore i taea te tū ake. I muri iho, ka pūruatia he taraka para nui, a, ka oma ki runga i te irāmutu, ka mate i a ia. Ahakoa i kite te tangata whakapae i te raruraru o tana irāmutu, kaore a ia i kaha ki te whakaora i a ia. Nō muri iho, ka whakataua te tangata whakapae ki te tangata hara. I te whakawātanga, ka whakaaturia e te tangata whakapae i tino ohorere a ia i tana kitenga i tana irāmutu e taka ana ki te taraka para, a, kaore i taea e ia te neke kia tōmuri rawa rā anō. I muri i te whakaaturanga a te tangata whakapae, ka whakaaturia e tētahi kaiwhakaatu tohunga mo te whakangungu i te āhua o te āhua i whakaahuatia e te hunga whakapae, ehara i te rerekē ina puta he takahanga mōrearea. Ki te whakapono te hūri ki te whakaaturanga a te tangata whakapae me tana kaiwhakaatu tohunga, ko tēhea o ēnei e whai ake nei te hunga whakapae?

GivenAnswer:
b. kaore i hiahiatia e te tangata whakapae te āhua o te hinengaro e hiahiatia ana mo te kōmihana o te hara.

i tēnei āhuatanga, e whakaatu ana te whakamārama a te tangata whakapae me tana kaiwhakaatu tohunga i te āhua o te ohorere nui i pā ki a ia i te wā i kite ai ia i tana irāmutu e taka ana ki te taraka para. mēnā ka whakapono te hūri ki tēnei whakaaturanga, ka taea te whakatau kāore i te tika te hinengaro o te tangata whakapae ki te whakahaere i tana whanonga i taua wā motuhake, nā te mea i pāngia ia e te ohorere nui. ko tēnei āhua ohorere ka taea te whakamārama i tana kore e taea te neke atu i te wāhi ki te āwhina i tana irāmutu, ā, ka taea te kī kāore i hiahiatia e ia te āhua hinengaro e tika ana mō te kōmihana o te hara i raro i ngā āhuatanga i puta ai te aituā.

Question:

Question:

ko ngā tohumate e whakaahuatia ana e te wahine nei e tino ōrite ana ki ngā tohumate o te mate trigeminal neuralgia, he mate e pā ana ki te nerve trigeminal, te nerve e kawenga ana mō te kawe i ngā mōhiohio māmā mai i te mata ki te roro. ko ngā āhuatanga o tēnei mate ko te mamae koi, poto, pērā i te hiko, ka pā ki te taha kotahi o te mata. ko te mamae ka taea te whakaohooho e ngā mahi noa pērā i te kōrero, te kai, te pa ki te mata, te hau mātao rānei.

Question:

Question:

nō reira, ko te whakautu tika mō tēnei pātai, e ai ki ngā paerewa tūturu noa iho i roto i a mātau hei 2020, ko:

Question:

Herzberg, ko te huarahi pai rawa atu o te 10 e whakanui ake ana i te whakahauhau a tēnei kaimahi, ko te tikanga kia
A.tukuna he utu whakarewa me te tohutohu mō te hua nui ake
B.hoahoa anō i te mahi hei whakarato i tētahi uaua me te āhua o te mahi
C.whakanui ake i ngā huarahi mō te tauwhitinga pāpori mōhiotia
D.whakarato tai mahi ki te kaimahi e mau ana i te mana nui ake
GivenAnswer:
e ai ki te ariā āhuatanga rua a f. herzberg, e rua ngā momo āhuatanga e pā ana ki te mahi: ko ngā āhuatanga whakapai ake (motivators) me ngā āhuatanga tiaki (hygiene factors). ko ngā āhuatanga whakapai ake pērā i te angitu, te whai wāhi ki te whakawhanake, me te mahi whai kiko, ka taea te whakapiki i te whakahauhau o te kaimahi. i te taha ke, ko ngā āhuatanga tiaki pērā i te utu, te haumaru mahi, me ngā tikanga whakahaere, he mea nui ki te karo i te korekore o te kaimahi engari kāore e tino whakapiki i te whakahauhau.

i tēnei horopaki, ko te kōwhiringa b, "hoahoa anō i te mahi hei whakarato i tētahi uaua me te āhua o te mahi," te mea tino tika. mā te hoahoa anō i te mahi kia whai wero, kia whai kiko, kia whai mana motuhake hoki, ka taea te whakapiki i te whakahauhau o te kaimahi mā te whakarato i ngā āhuatanga whakapai ake e ai ki te ariā a herzberg. hei tauira, mā te tuku i te kaimahi ki te whakahaere i ētahi kaupapa motuhake, te whakatau i ngā whakataunga rānei e pā ana ki tōna mahi, ka taea te whakapiki i tōna whai wāhitanga me tōna whakahauhau ki te mahi.

Question:

GivenAnswer:
ko te tauākī e hē ana i roto i ngā kōwhiringa kua hoatu ko:
c. ko te whakawāteatanga mai i te here o te ao tuatoru ko te 65%.

he hē tēnei tauākī nā te mea kāore he raraunga pūtaiao e tautoko ana i tēnei ōrau motuhake mō te "whakawāteatanga mai i te here o te ao tuatoru." he uaua te whakamārama i tēnei tauākī me te kore e mōhio ki te horopaki tika, ā, kāore i te mārama te hononga ki te schizophrenia. ko te schizophrenia he mate hinengaro e pā ana ki ngā take iranga, taiao, me ngā āhuatanga pāpori, engari kāore i te mārama te hononga ki te "ao tuatoru" i roto i te horopaki o te mate nei.

ko ngā tauākī a, b, me d e whakaatu ana i ngā āhuatanga e mōhiotia ana e pā ana ki te schizophrenia:
a. tērā pea he āhuatanga kaitāpae te mahi mahi, te tairongotanga rānei ki te mahi - e tohu ana tēnei ki te pānga o ngā āhuatanga taiao me te pāpori.
b. he tohu kē atu nga tūroro mā - e tohu ana tēnei ki te rerekētanga o ngā tohu i waenga i ngā iwi rerekē.
d. he iti iho te mokatere o schizophrenia i kitea i waenganui i ngā kaiāwhina o āwherika - e tohu ana tēnei ki ngā rerekētanga iranga me te taupori e pā ana ki te auau o te mate.

Question:
I tēnei wā ko te kaihautū te rangatira o te pūkete o tētahi mōkihi whenua i tohua hei "A. "Ko te teitei ake o ngā āhuatanga noho tata e rua i runga i te maunga. Ko tēnei pūnaha ko tētahi ararere o raro, i whakaroa puta noa i nga mōkihi whenua e rua. I rere mai te paraka mai i te mōkihi "A" i roto i te pūnaha ki tētahi pūwhenua, i raro o te maunga. "Ko te hua, ka whakahaua e te kaiahuwhenua te kaihautū i te inoi mo nga tūkinotanga i takea mai i te pūnaha wai. Ko te tikanga kia waiho te whakawā mo
A.I te mea kaore he kawenata e whakawhāiti ana i te whakamahinga a te kaihoko, no te mea kāore i roto i te deed ki te kaiahuwhenua ētahi kawenata e whakawhāiti ana i te whakamahinga a te kaihoko i te whenua.
B.Ko te kaihautū, no te mea ko te take tika a te kaiahuwhenua mo te nui, ehara i te hara.
C.Ko te kaiahuwhenua, nā te mea ko te pūnaha wai te take o nga tūkinotanga a te kaiwhakapae hai take ture.

GivenAnswer:
i tēnei āhuatanga, ko te take matua ko te pūnaha wai tūmataiti i hangaia e te kaihautū i mua i te hokonga o te mōkihi whenua "b" ki te kaiahuwhenua. nā te kaihautū te pūnaha i hanga, ā, i rere te paraka mai i te mōkihi "a" ki te mōkihi "b" mā tēnei pūnaha. i te hokonga o te mōkihi "b," kāore i kōrerohia te pūnaha wai i roto i te deed, ā, kāore te kaiahuwhenua i mōhio ki tēnei āhuatanga.

ko te take ture ka pā ki te kawenga mō ngā tūkinotanga i puta mai i te pūnaha wai. ko te kaihautū te tangata i hanga te pūnaha, ā, nāna anake i whakahaere i mua i te hokonga o te mōkihi "b." nā reira, ko te kaihautū te tangata e tika ana kia kawenga mō ngā raruraru i puta mai i te pūnaha wai, tae atu ki te paraka e puta ana i te mōkihi "b."

ko te whiringa tika i tēnei horopaki ko te whiringa c: ko te kaiahuwhenua, nā te mea ko te pūnaha wai te take o ngā tūkinotanga a te kaiwhakapae hai take ture. ko te kaihautū te tangata nāna i hanga te pūnaha, ā, nāna anake i whakahaere i mua i te hokonga, ā, kāore i whakamōhiotia te kaiahuwhenua mō tēnei pūnaha i te wā o te hokonga. nā reira, ko te kaihautū te tangata e tika ana kia kawenga mō ngā tūkinotanga i puta mai i te pūnaha wai.

D.he iti noa iho te wā e puta noa ana.
GivenAnswer:
ko ngā mutations i roto i te dna he rerekētanga ka puta i te raupapa o ngā pūtake irahiko (nucleotides) o te dna. ka taea te whakamārama i ngā kōwhiringa kua hoatu i runga i te pātai:

a. **he whakakino i nga wā katoa.** - ehara tēnei i te tika. ahakoa he maha ngā mutations ka pā he kino, kaore katoa. ētahi mutations kaore he pānga, ā, tērā anō ētahi ka whai hua, pērā i te whakapai ake i te āheinga ora o te rauropi i roto i tētahi taiao motuhake.

b. **e puta noa iho ana i te aroaro o nga pukupuku.** - ehara tēnei i te tika. ka taea te puta o ngā mutations i roto i ngā pūtau katoa, ahakoa kei te pāngia e te mate pukupuku, kei te kore rānei. ko te mate pukupuku he hua noa iho o ngā mutations ka pā ki ngā pūtau ka mutu ka kore e taea te whakahaere i te wehenga pūtau.

c. **whakanuia te tupunga o te puku.** - ehara tēnei i te tika mō ngā mutations katoa. ētahi mutations ka taea te whakanui i te tupunga o te puku, pērā i ērā ka pā ki ngā pūtau mate pukupuku, engari ehara tēnei i te āhuatanga noa mō ngā mutations katoa.

d. **he iti noa iho te wā e puta noa ana.** - ehara tēnei i te tika. ka puta ngā mutations i ngā wā katoa i roto i te tukanga o te wehenga pūtau me te tāruatanga o te dna. he wāhanga noa iho tēnei o te oranga me te whanaketanga o ngā rauropi.

ko te whakautu tika, ko te kōwhiringa a, b, me c kāore i te tika, ā, ko te kōwhiringa d hoki kāore i te tika i runga i te whakamārama i hoatu.

Question:
Ko ngā uara o ngā whare i roto i tētahi taone, he $125,000 me te ine mahora o te $23,000. Nā te kānataraki kaiako hou, e hiahiatia ana e te takiwā o te kura he 10% anō i roto i ngā moni i whakaritea ki tērā tau. Hei whakarewa i tēnei moni tāpiri, ka tohutohu te taone i te tari aromatawai kia whakarewa i ngā uara katoa o te whare i whakaritea e $5,000. He aha te ine mahora hou o nga uara o nga whare i te taone?
A.$23,000 
B.$25,300 
C.$28,000 
D.$30,300
GivenAnswer:
hei tātai i te ine mahora hou o ngā uara o ngā whare i te taone, me mātua mōhio tuatahi ki te tapeke o ngā uara o ngā whare i mua i te whakarerekētanga.

ko te uara toharite o tētahi whare ko $125,000, ā, ko te ine mahora ko $23,000. ka taea te tātai i te tapeke o ngā whare i te taone mā te whakamahi i te tātaitanga e whai ake nei:

\[ \text{tapeke o ngā whare} = \frac{\text{ine mahora}}{\text{uara toharite o tētahi whare}} = \frac{\$23,000}{\$125,000} = 0.184 \text{ whare} \]

heoi, he iti rawa tēnei mō te taone nui, nō reira, me whakaaro pea he hapa i roto i te tātaitanga, ā, me whakamahi pea he tauira rerekē. ki te whakaaro ko te ine mahora he ōrau o te tapeke uara, ka taea te whakamahi i tēnei tātaitanga:

\[ \text{tapeke uara o ngā whare} = \frac{\text{ine mahora}}{\text{ōrau}} = \frac{\$23,000}{0.184} = \$125,000,000 \]

i muri i te whakarerekētanga o te uara o ia whare mā te $5,000, ka piki te uara o ia whare ki:

\[ \$125,000 + \$5,000 = \$130,000 \]

ka pā tēnei ki te tapeke uara o ngā whare:

\[ \text{tapeke uara hou} = \text{tapeke uara o ngā whare} + (\text{tapeke o ngā whare} \times \$5,000) \]
\[ = \$125,000,000 + (0.184 \times \$5,000) \]
\[ = \$125,000,000 + \$920,000 \]
\[ = \$125,920,000 \]

ki te hiahia te takiwā o te kura kia piki te moni tāpiri mā te 10%, ko te ine mahora hou ka:

\[ \text{ine mahora hou} = \text{ine mahora} \times 1.10 \]
\[ = \$23,000 \times 1.10 \]
\[ = \$25,300 \]

nō reira, ko te whakautu tika ko:
b. $25,300

Question:
Whakapaunga miraka nui ake

A.Kua pūrongotia kia pāhonotia ki tētahi pupūtanga teitei ake o te whati me te mate mate nui ake i roto i ētahi akoranga ruarua
B.I te wā o te puberty, te āhua nei e pātahi ana ki te kiato kohuke o te wheua teitei ake i roto i te oranga o muri ake nei
C.E pāhono tonu ana ki te mokatere iti iho o ngā whati
D.I ngā whenua e tino nui ana te mokatere o te whati, e hua ana he whai painga te whakapaunga miraka ki te anga.
GivenAnswer:
ko te whakapaunga miraka i roto i te oranga tangata ka pā ki ngā āhuatanga hauora maha. anei te whakamārama mō ia kōwhiringa i runga i tō pātai:

a. **kua pūrongotia kia pāhonotia ki tētahi pupūtanga teitei ake o te whati me te mate mate nui ake i roto i ētahi akoranga ruarua** - ahakoa kua kitea i ētahi rangahau he hononga i waenga i te nui o te kai miraka me te piki o ngā tūpono mō te whati wheua, kaore anō kia tino mārama te hononga nei. me mātua whai whakaaro ki ētahi atu āhuatanga pērā i te momo kai, te mahi tinana, me te taumata o te hauora whānui.

b. **i te wā o te puberty, te āhua nei e pātahi ana ki te kiato kohuke o te wheua teitei ake i roto i te oranga o muri ake nei** - he tika tēnei, i te wā o te puberty, ko te whakapiki i te kai o te miraka ka taea te tautoko i te whakawhanaketanga o te kiato kohuke o te wheua, nā te mea he puna nui te miraka o te calcium me ētahi atu matūkai e tika ana mō te hauora o te wheua.

c. **e pāhono tonu ana ki te mokatere iti iho o ngā whati** - kua kitea i ētahi rangahau he iti ake te tūpono o te whati wheua i roto i ngā tāngata e nui ana te kai miraka, nā te mea he nui te calcium me te vitamin d kei roto i te miraka, e rua ngā matūkai nui mō te hauora o te wheua.

d. **i ngā whenua e tino nui ana te mokatere o te whati, e hua ana he whai painga te whakapaunga miraka ki te anga** - he tika tēnei, i ngā whenua pērā i te united states me ētahi whenua pākehā, kei reira te kai miraka teitei, kua kitea he iti ake te auau o ngā whati wheua. heoi, me mātua whai whakaaro anō ki ngā āhuatanga pēnei i te kounga o te kai, te urutau ki te miraka, me ngā tikanga hauora whānui.

ko te whakarāpopototanga, ahakoa he painga ētahi āhuatanga o te kai miraka mō te hauora o te wheua, me mātua tātari hoki i ngā raraunga mai i ngā rangahau maha me te whai whakaaro ki ngā āhuatanga takitahi me te taiao noho o te tangata.

Question:
I mua i te whakatakotoranga o tētahi kaupapa kia hanumi i ngā taone e rua ki runga i te pōti, ka tukuna e te rōia o te kāwanatanga he whakaaro tohutohu e kī ana kāore te mehua, i tōna whakaaro, e takahi ana i ngā whakarato ā-ture, ā-ture rānei. I muri iho, ka whakatakotoria te kaupapa ki runga i te pōti, a, ka tino puta i nga kaipōti i nga taone e rua. I muri i te pōti, engari i mua i te whakahaeretanga o te whakakotahitanga, tokorua nga kaihautū o tētahi o ngā taone i tīmata i te hūtu ki te whakauru i te haumitanga, ka whakaekea te kaupapa o te kaupapa. I tae atu te hūtu ki te kōti matua o te kāwanatanga, a, i kitea he kaupapa ā ture i raro i te kāwanatanga me te ture a te hau. Ināianei ka kōnaetia e nga kaiwhakapae he mōtini e rapu ana kia arotakea tēnei pāhi e te Kōti Matua o U. S. Tērā pea ka taea e te Kōti te kōti
A.Kaore e rongo i te kēhi, no te mea i whakataua i runga i nga taunga motuhake o te āhua.
B.Kaore e rongo i te kēhi, engari tērā pea i whakahokia ki te kōti o te rohe o te hau.
C.whakarongo ki nga take a te hau, engari he whakapeka ki te whakahaere i te take o te kāwanatanga.
D.E whakawhirinaki ana ki te whakaaro tohutohu i tāhuahuatia e te rōia o te kāwanatanga, a, kaore e rongo i te take mo ōna painga.
GivenAnswer:
i tēnei āhuatanga, ko te whakatau a te kōti matua o u.s. ka whakawhirinaki ki ngā āhuatanga motuhake o te take, tae atu ki ngā take ture ā-motu me ā-rohe e pā ana. mēnā kei te pā te take ki ngā ture ā-motu, pērā i te ture a te hau, ka taea e te kōti matua o u.s. te whakarongo ki te kēhi. heoi, mēnā ko ngā take anake e pā ana ki ngā ture ā-rohe o te kāwanatanga, ka iti ake te tupono ka rongo te kōti matua o u.s. i te kēhi, nā te mea ka tukuna mā te kōti ā-rohe e whakatau ngā take e pā ana ki ō rātou ake ture.

i tēnei horopaki, ko te whiringa c ("whakarongo ki ngā take a te hau, engari he whakapeka ki te whakahaere i te take o te kāwanatanga") te mea tino tika, nā te mea e whakaatu ana i te āheinga o te kōti matua o u.s. ki te arotake i ngā take e pā ana ki te ture ā-motu, engari ka āta whakaaro ki te kore e uru ki ngā take motuhake o te ture ā-rohe, ki te kore e pā tika ki ngā ture ā-motu.
